articles.description: Had Sir Mo Farah, 39, (pictured as a child) not replaced Mohamed on that fateful flight, he might never have made his home in Britain.
articles.content:
The year is 1993 and, even though no one knew it at the time, an extraordinary story is unfolding at Heathrow Airport.
Standing patiently in the crowd on the public side of the 'green channel', wait… [+19482 chars]

articles.author: Sami Mokbel, Adrian Kajumba
articles.title: Arsenal offer Bukayo Saka a long-term deal worth double his current wages to fend off Man City - Daily Mail
articles.description: His current terms expire in under two years and talks over an extension have been ongoing. Sportsmail revealed last week that Arsenal would accelerate talks over a new deal amid Manchester City interest.
articles.content:
Arsenal have offered Bukayo Saka a new long-term contract that would see him become one of the clubs best paid players.
